scripts.migrate:setup: rm -rf migrations-temp && mkdir -p migrations-temp && ln -sf $PWD/database-specs/migrations/* $PWD/migrations-temp/ && ln -sf $PWD/migrations/* $PWD/migrations-temp/
scripts.migrate:up: npm run migrate:setup && DBMATE_MIGRATIONS_DIR=./migrations-temp dbmate up
scripts.migrate:rollback: npm run migrate:setup && DBMATE_MIGRATIONS_DIR=./migrations-temp dbmate rollback
scripts.migrate:status: npm run migrate:setup && DBMATE_MIGRATIONS_DIR=./migrations-temp dbmate status
